data.title: Christian Universities & Higher Education
data.meta_description: Earn an undergraduate or graduate degree at Wayland Baptist University, a Southern Baptist affiliated university located in several states across the U.S. and overseas.
data.text:
Browse Academic Majors

Find the program that's right for you. Browse options from our 8 academic schools.

Find Out More

Visit Campus

Future Pioneers are always welcome on campus. Plan a visit today and learn what college life is all about.

Read More

New Doctorate Degree

Transform your organization with Wayland's Doctor of Strategic Leadership, which emphasizes communication, leadership, structure, team building, and cultural understanding.

Find Out More

Adult Learners

While Wayland Plainview is a vibrant, residential campus, Wayland also caters to working adults with a number of extension campuses where classes are offered in the evenings or online. Find a campus near you.

Find Out More

Military and Veterans

As a military or veteran student, you can take advantage of our dedicated resources and support services to help you achieve your academic and personal goals.

Find Out More

One of the nationâs top Christian universities, Wayland is a place that will bring out your best. Integrating faith and learning, Wayland provides an exceptional liberal arts education in an opportunity-filled environment. You will be challenged, encouraged and inspired in every way.

Christian

A leap of faith has Christian right where he wants to be.
